reviews.text: Large selection of used records, a little curated which is nice. Small selection of new records, but still a good variety. It’s the extra stuff that ties the package together into a really great store. They have cleaning brushes and kits, new and used turntables, and a listening station with a Rega Planar 3 and Meze Audio headphones. Looking forward to coming back!
reviews.author: Ekvan Andrusk

reviews.text: This is truly a phenomenal store. Fantastic selection of new/used vinyl at great price points. Very friendly workers who put a lot of thought into the small details for a great experience. Will definitely be back!
reviews.author: Maxson Thomas

reviews.text:
I want to extend my heartfelt thanks to the incredible team at Vinyl Lab Records. I was in a car accident right outside their location, and without hesitation, several employees came outside to check on me and offer help.
In a moment of stress and shock, their kindness, calmness, and willingness to assist made a huge difference. Whether it was helping me stay calm, calling for help, or just showing genuine concern — their actions meant more than I can express.
You don’t expect strangers to step up like that, but they did — and it shows what kind of people work at this business. I’ll never forget their support and compassion that day. Thank you again for going above and beyond. You all have made all the difference for me.
—Arielle
reviews.author: Arielle Warner

reviews.text:

reviews.author: Arielle Warner

reviews.text:
I was pleasantly surprised by Vinyl Labs! They have some really good records, many in pristine condition, and for very low prices. I honestly didn’t expect much, but when I got home and played the albums, they played flawlessly. I’m shocked (in the best way)!

The staff were super friendly and helpful...just great guys all around. They’ve definitely got a new customer in me, and I’ll be stopping by often as I continue to build my collection. I’ll update this post with names once I grab their business cards, but for now...major kudos to the whole team!

Highly recommend checking them out if you’re into vinyl.
reviews.author: Mike Ingram

reviews.text:

reviews.text: Nice place! Grand opening is projected for 8/23. Staff are very nice, trade ins were very easy and reasonably paid for, and the selection is great. NIN was playing during my visit. Staff clearly love music. Don't sleep on this place.
reviews.author: Zachary Lubow

reviews.text: Nice place! Grand opening is projected for 8/23. Staff are very nice, trade ins were very easy and reasonably paid for, and the selection is great. NIN was playing during my visit. Staff clearly love music. Don't sleep on this place.

reviews.text: A fantastic record  store… I could spend hours here! Lots of new and used. Reasonably priced. This is a must for anyone who loves vinyl
reviews.author: Kevin Subers

reviews.text: A fantastic record  store… I could spend hours here! Lots of new and used. Reasonably priced. This is a must for anyone who loves vinyl

reviews.text: Wow! This place is unbelievable! So many records, cds, cassettes, all kinds of audio doo-dads! Gotta come around the back of the building, and up the staircase, and you're in record dreamland. Check this place out!
reviews.author: Nick Guarino

reviews.text: Wow! This place is unbelievable! So many records, cds, cassettes, all kinds of audio doo-dads! Gotta come around the back of the building, and up the staircase, and you're in record dreamland. Check this place out!
reviews.author: Nick Guarino

reviews.text:
It's a nice place! I say it's worth visiting if you're near the area. The gentleman that was there was very nice, and offered to give me a quick little breakdown of the location - which was a nice gesture but I was deadset on the CD's. It looks like they have set up an area for live shows - so it'll be nice to see how that evolves. Please note that this place requires you going up a set of stairs. The entrace is on the back/side of the building (look for signs).

The selections and prices are within reason. Some items I felt were slightly overpriced, but nothing egregious. They had a nice small variety, with a lot of your typical artists, bands, and albums.  I am seeing that they are still working on putting out inventory, so it's worth revisiting!

I did end up buying a few items - however The Roots album I purchased ended up having a Toby Keith cd instead. Not the best surprise. I didn't go back since it's far from where I live and by the time I discovered that issue it was far too late in the day - and I just didn't want to go through all that for $4.00. Partially on me for not looking first, but I would also ask that they review their used CD's before putting them out.
reviews.author: Frank Muniz

reviews.text: Very nice! They had a good selection of records, although i didn't check out the CDs. A lot of the stuff was expensive, but the used stuff was cheap! Got The Doors (The Doors), Simon & Garfunkel (Bookends), and Elton John (Greatest Hits).
reviews.author: Rock afire fan 185

reviews.text:
Really cool space, fairly close by to me which is nice. I wish them all the luck. My criticism is their used record prices are not great. I’ve gone a couple times now and that hasn’t improved since opening.

Any record stores with longevity have much better used prices because they know this isn’t online selling, there aren’t fees involved and customers are going out of their way to come in store. Discogs prices is a very rough estimate and prices should always be well below otherwise what keeps people wanting to come back to what they can find online.if the used prices need to be this high, then perhaps the amount you are paying on collections is the problem.

In any case I look forward to seeing this place continue to develop!
reviews.author: Matthew Kelly

reviews.text:
Thanks for stopping by and for the 5 stars, Nick! We really appreciate the support and hope to see you back in the shop again soon.

Vinyl Lab

reviews.text:
Joanne, thank you for leaving us a 5-star review! We’re thrilled to hear you had a great experience at Vinyl Lab. Your feedback motivates our team and truly means the world to us. If there’s anything we can improve to make your next visit even better, we’d love to hear it!

Vinyl Lab Staff
reviews.author: Joanne Markulec
